script_shortcuts.name: Script: ^+y
script_shortcuts.action:
; Copy selected text
    A_Clipboard := ""
    Send("^c")
    ClipWait(1)
    if !A_Clipboard {
        MsgBox "Clipboard is empty or no text was selected."
        return
    }
    ; Normalize clipboard content
    raw := A_Clipboard
    lines := []
    maxLen := 0
    for line in StrSplit(raw, "`n", "`r") {
        cleanLine := StrReplace(line, "`t", "    ")  ; Replace tabs with 4 spaces
        cleanLine := Trim(cleanLine)
        lines.Push(cleanLine)
        if (StrLen(cleanLine) > maxLen)
            maxLen := StrLen(cleanLine)
    }
    ; Build box border
    border := "#" . StrRepeat("#", maxLen + 1) . "!"
    ; Format box
    output := border . "`r`n"
    for line in lines {
        padding := StrRepeat(" ", maxLen + 1 - StrLen(line))
        output .= line . padding . "#!" . "`r`n"
    }
    output .= border
    ; Paste result
    A_Clipboard := output
    Sleep(50)
    Send("^v")

script_shortcuts.name: Script: ^+b
script_shortcuts.action:
; Copy selected text
    A_Clipboard := ""
    Send("^c")
    ClipWait(1)
    if !A_Clipboard {
        MsgBox "Nothing selected!"
        return
    }

    ; Split into lines and normalize tabs → spaces
    rawLines := StrSplit(A_Clipboard, "`n", "`r")
    maxLen := 0

    for i, line in rawLines {
        clean := StrReplace(line, "`t", "    ")
        rawLines[i] := clean
        if (StrLen(clean) > maxLen)
            maxLen := StrLen(clean)
    }

    ; Build top/bottom border (one extra “#” for padding)
    border := ";!" . StrRepeatf("#", maxLen + 1) . "#"

    ; Assemble boxed output
    output := border . "`r`n"
    for line in rawLines {
        padding := StrRepeatf(" ", maxLen + 1 - StrLen(line))
        output .= line . padding . ";!#" . "`r`n"
    }
    output .= border

    ; Replace selection with box
    A_Clipboard := output
    Sleep 50
    Send("^v")

script_shortcuts.name: Script: ^!z
script_shortcuts.action:
SendText("❓")
    Sleep(100)
    send("^!{Numpad2}")
    Sleep(100)
    SendText(" ➔ ")
    Sleep(100)
    send("^!{Numpad1}")
    Sleep(100)
    ; SendText(",")
    Sleep(100)
    Send("{Enter}")
